title: Sensor Exposure
description: Defines the exposure details of a sensor installed on an oceanographic platform, indicating how the sensor interacts with its surrounding environment.

id.description: A unique identifier for the sensor exposure configuration.

ref.description: A reference code representing the type of exposure (e.g., sheltered, open-air, submerged).

pub47_ref.description: Reference to WMO Publication No. 47 (Pub47) if the sensor exposure is registered there, for international standardization.
